extendedInfo.description: Supercharge your SMS Text & Call Notifications with Ringo Pro, the leading customisation app for Android!Ringo lets you easily pick and use any MP3 music file as your ringtone - and set individual ringtones for each of your contacts and caller groups.Ringo really powers up your SMS text message notifications too - set a different tone for each contact's messages, and control LED colors (when supported), caller or message sender voice announcing, pop-up notifications and more!In fact, Ringo Pro allows you to customize almost every aspect of ring tone and SMS notification. If you are one of the many people who donât notice the polite vibrating of the phone when it rings, Ringo Pro offers a much stronger vibration. Vibration patterns are aptly named: Discreet, Classic, Enthusiastic, Frenzied, and Relentless. Ringo Pro will really shine as you start to apply its custom settings to caller groups and to individuals in your contact list. Each person can be assigned a unique ring tone, unique SMS tone, their own color of blinking LED (on phoens that support it), and a unique level of vibrate intensity. You will know instantly whether a call is from your brother, boss, or broker. One user sets a discrete ring tone and SMS tone as a default, then gives each important caller his or her unique tones.Ringo Pro is packed full of customization options, so you can configure your incoming calls and SMS Text alerts exactly how you want them!If you are using Ringo with GO SMS Pro or Handcent, note that these apps can disable the SMS notifications for all other apps, including Ringo, which stops Ringo working. You can fix this in their settings.In GO SMS Pro, tap Menu / Settings / Advanced tab / Notification Settings, and uncheck Notifications. Then go to  Receive Settings and un-check 'Disable other message notification'.In Handcent, Tap Menu / Settings / Application Settings.Tap 'Default Messaging Application', and choose Disable.Then turn on 'Lower priority'.

reviews.title: Not what it used to be...
reviews.comment: Notification icon flickers and some of my messages totally disappear.
reviews.author: Carol Lately

reviews.title: Notification icons
reviews.comment: For $5, you should be able to customize the notification icon....  Add for 5 stars.
reviews.author: William J. Bittner, III

reviews.comment: Amazing app! Makes life a million times easier to know exactly who is calling or texting before you answer by using the ringtones! Super easy to use and customer service is out of this world!\tI cannot live my life without this app! The best app on the market, hands down! I love it and would recommend it to anyone who likes both variety and organization! Thank you very much!
reviews.author: Lorie Engleking

reviews.title: Galaxy s4 active
reviews.comment: My sms tone is way  quieter than the call tone and it doesn\'t matter what Ringtone I use!!!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Paid version had the features I wanted, plus no ads. Works well on droid 4

reviews.title: Used to be okay
reviews.comment: This app was good. For some reason I think it has a problem with Samsung devices. It loses settings, so I am constantly having to configure the sound settings for each group. And the standard fix for notifications works on devices other than Samsung.

reviews.title: Best app 4 custom tones
reviews.comment: Best app for custom tones. Been using many years. 3rd phone with it.  Works great and if i have questions,  emails are answered promptly.

reviews.title: Ringo Pro
reviews.comment: It\'s worth the money to buy Ringo Pro. You can set your individual call and text tones, vibration pattern, and led color. I love this app, and have used it for years on all my phones. Buy it, people! :)

reviews.title: Dont ring
reviews.comment: When I get a call my phone does not ring
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs MMS support
reviews.comment: Will give 5th star if MMS support is enabled. Using Handscent sms the MMS is silent when a picture or video is received. In order to use Ringo with Handscent you have to set it as not the default messaging app. This causes MMS to have no ring tone when Ringo is handling the sounds.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent job!!! Love it I have this app for two of my phones.

reviews.comment: Love this

reviews.comment: At one time it worked great it is now very very  mediocre and I get the feeling the deve oper could not care less. Also quits quite a bit.\tYou cannot communicate with these people if you have a problem they will not answer your emails be a  wear

reviews.comment: I\'ve had the app for a few years, now the sms tones don\'t work. Used to be an excellent app

reviews.title: ZTE WARP N860
reviews.comment: Would be awesome if it wouldn\'t crash so much, causing me to turn off my phone completely and removing then reinstalling my memory card.
reviews.author: Gail Law

reviews.title: Loses messages
reviews.comment: I have had this app for 2 years and loved it. Now it randomly will lose the message. The sound plays, the popup is on the screen, but when you open the text, it acts like it never received anything. I am getting really sick of having to ask people to resend their messages over and over.
reviews.author: Amanda Johnson
